name: Chipotle-Orange Guacamole With Toasted Pumpkin Seeds
description: Toasted pepitas and orange zest make for a crunchy and aromatic variation that packs a bold, spicy powerful punch.
recipeIngredient: 2 canned chipotles in adobo sauce, finely minced, plus 2 tablespoons sauce from can

recipeInstructions.text: Combine guacamole, chipotle, pumpkin seeds, and orange zest. Serve immediately with warm tortilla chips.
